archimate:DataObject.name: MetricMeasurementJob
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A MetricManagementJob is a management activity that may consist of several steps but is performed as a single logical unit in a Metric context. It can be a one-time activity or a regular one. In the latter case; a schedule definition is attached to it. A MetricMeasurementJob defines a measurement job for a scope of monitored objects using the MonitoredMetricObjectCriterion.
